dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October/November 1976
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Convalescing after a mild heart attack, she meditates on the beauty of nature and the joy of singing. Says she needs to work at being less irritable. Recommends an article on death someone sent her.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 574 1976-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
